resources.string: An important lesson learned in online political campaigns in recent years and other collaborative efforts that had online components is
a. people much prefer to do their own thing and not work in groups
b. there is always a couple people who disrupt the work of others in the group
c. people need to be able to meet face to face at times as well as online
d. social media has still not lived up to its promise of helping people collaborate
pissed at all the tedious efforts of old school quiz platforms? try giving sQUIZ a try. all your awesome quizzes just a tap away...
